workflow_summary.task: Apply guard on req.body in analyze.ts, re-test, build, and generate artifacts + PR body

supervisor_service_tests.note: Tests passed but latent bug existed - direct destructuring would fail with undefined req.body

before.latent_issue: const { code }: AnalyzeRequest = req.body would throw TypeError in real HTTP requests

supervisor_service_tests.note: Tests still pass with improved robustness - guard handles undefined req.body gracefully

after.fix_applied: const rawBody = (req as any)?.body ?? {}; const code = typeof rawBody.code === 'string' ? rawBody.code : undefined

security_reminder.privacy_compliance: Local storage only, secrets properly masked

after: const code = typeof rawBody.code === "string" ? rawBody.code : undefined
